source.data:
@account @regression
Feature: Account - Account Details
    #Author: Alfe Niño Laña 01/19/2024

    #-------------------------------------
    # JIRA ticket: EN-2785
    #-------------------------------------

    Scenario Outline: Verify that error message displays when empty on required fields
        Given I login in the HiJack Poker
        When I logged in using the testing account
        And I click my profile
        And I click the Account button
        And I click the edit "<fieldName>" on Account Details
        And I empty the name field of "<fieldName>"
        And I click the Save button of "<fieldName>" on account details
        Then The error message "<errorMessage>" should be displayed
        Examples:
            | fieldName    | errorMessage                      |
            | Display Name | Display Name should not be empty! |
            | First Name   | First Name should not be empty!   |
            | Last Name    | Last Name should not be empty!    |

    Scenario: Verify that player can successfully edit their account details
        Given I login in the HiJack Poker
        When I logged in using the testing account
        And I click my profile
        And I click the Account button
        And I click the edit "Last Name" on Account Details
        And I edit the "Last Name" to "Sample" on Account Details

scenario.name: Verify that error message displays when empty on required fields

steps.text: I login in the HiJack Poker
I logged in using the testing account
I click my profile
I click the Account button
I click the edit "<fieldName>" on Account Details
I empty the name field of "<fieldName>"
I click the Save button of "<fieldName>" on account details
The error message "<errorMessage>" should be displayed

cells.value: Display Name should not be empty!
First Name should not be empty!
Last Name should not be empty!

scenario.name: Verify that player can successfully edit their account details

steps.text: I login in the HiJack Poker
I logged in using the testing account
I click my profile
I click the Account button
I click the edit "Last Name" on Account Details
I edit the "Last Name" to "Sample" on Account Details

# JIRA ticket: EN-2785

I click the Save button of "Last Name" on account details

I click the edit "Last Name" on Account Details
I edit the "Last Name" to "Sample" on Account Details

pattern.source: I login in the HiJack Poker
I logged in using the testing account
I click my profile
I click the logout button
I access the website by manually entering the URL
I input the test email in the login email
I click the forget password
I click the Login with Email option
I input invalid email for login
I input invalid password
I click the login button
I click the edit {string} on Account Details
I empty the name field of {string}
I click the Save button of {string} on account details
I click the Account button
I edit the {string} to {string} on Account Details
I click the the Register Now with Email
I input the email to be verified for registration
I click the submit button in the registration
I type this verification code in the Registation modal
I click the verification code submit button
I input not an email in Registration
The login page HiJack will be displayed
The HiJack Logo header should be displayed
Reset password modal should be displayed
The login error message should be displayed
The error message {string} should be displayed
The Verify Your Email modal should be displayed
Verification info message is displayed on registration modal
The failed error message for email code verification should be displayed
The failed error message for rmail format in registration should be displayed

source.data:
@login @regression
Feature: Front Office - Login Page
    #Author: Alfe Niño Laña 01/18/2024

    #-------------------------------------
    # JIRA ticket: EN-2785
    #-------------------------------------

    Scenario: Verify that player can logout and not access the website by manually entering the URL
        # Given I logged in using the testing account
        Given I login in the HiJack Poker
        # When I logged in using the testing account
        When I click the Login with Email option
        And I logged in using the testing account
        And I click my profile
        And I click the logout button
        And I access the website by manually entering the URL
        Then The login page HiJack will be displayed

    # Scenario: Verify that player is redirected to cardhouse page after login and can enter lobby
    #     Given I login in the HiJack Poker
    #     When I logged in using the testing account
    #     Then The HiJack Logo header should be displayed

    # Scenario: Verify that user can reset password
    #     Given I login in the HiJack Poker
    #     When I click the Login with Email option
    #     And I input the test email in the login email
    #     And I click the forget password
    #     Then Reset password modal should be displayed

    # Scenario: Verify that user cannot login with invalid credentials
    #     Given I login in the HiJack Poker
    #     When I click the Login with Email option
    #     And I input invalid email for login
    #     And I input invalid password
    #     And I click the login button
    #     Then The login error message should be displayed

    # Scenario: Verify error message displays when incorrect password used
    #     Given I login in the HiJack Poker
    #     When I click the Login with Email option
    #     And I input the test email in the login email
    #     And I input invalid password
    #     And I click the login button
    #     Then The login error message should be displayed

scenario.name: Verify that player can logout and not access the website by manually entering the URL

steps.text: I login in the HiJack Poker
I click the Login with Email option
I logged in using the testing account
I click my profile
I click the logout button
I access the website by manually entering the URL
The login page HiJack will be displayed

The login page HiJack will be displayed

source.data:
@smoke @registration
Feature: Front Office - Registration
    #Author: Alfe Niño Laña 01/30/2024

    #-------------------------------------
    # JIRA ticket: EN-2824
    #-------------------------------------

    Scenario: Verify that clicking the "Register Now" button redirects the user to the "Verify Email" page.
        Given I login in the HiJack Poker
        When I click the the Register Now with Email
        Then The Verify Your Email modal should be displayed

    Scenario: Verify that when entering an email, the system prompts the user to verify the code sent to that email.
        Given I login in the HiJack Poker
        When I click the the Register Now with Email
        And I input the email to be verified for registration
        And I click the submit button in the registration
        Then Verification info message is displayed on registration modal

    Scenario: Verify that when an invalid code is entered, the system prevents the user from proceeding to the next step.
        Given I login in the HiJack Poker
        When I click the the Register Now with Email
        And I input the email to be verified for registration
        And I click the submit button in the registration
        And I type this verification code in the Registation modal
        And I click the verification code submit button
        Then The failed error message for email code verification should be displayed

    Scenario: Verify that when an email address is entered in an incorrect format
        Given I login in the HiJack Poker
        When I click the the Register Now with Email
        And I input not an email in Registration
        And I click the submit button in the registration
        Then The failed error message for rmail format in registration should be displayed

scenario.name: Verify that clicking the "Register Now" button redirects the user to the "Verify Email" page.

steps.text: I login in the HiJack Poker
I click the the Register Now with Email
The Verify Your Email modal should be displayed

scenario.name: Verify that when entering an email, the system prompts the user to verify the code sent to that email.

steps.text: I login in the HiJack Poker
I click the the Register Now with Email
I input the email to be verified for registration
I click the submit button in the registration
Verification info message is displayed on registration modal

scenario.name: Verify that when an invalid code is entered, the system prevents the user from proceeding to the next step.

steps.text: I login in the HiJack Poker
I click the the Register Now with Email
I input the email to be verified for registration
I click the submit button in the registration
I type this verification code in the Registation modal
I click the verification code submit button
The failed error message for email code verification should be displayed

scenario.name: Verify that when an email address is entered in an incorrect format

steps.text: I login in the HiJack Poker
I click the the Register Now with Email
I input not an email in Registration
I click the submit button in the registration
The failed error message for rmail format in registration should be displayed

I input the email to be verified for registration

I click the verification code submit button

I click the the Register Now with Email
I input not an email in Registration
I click the submit button in the registration
The failed error message for rmail format in registration should be displayed
